is-scroll.description: Whether tabs can be dragged left and right

:list.description: An array of tags with elements as objects, e.g. [{name: 'recommended'}]
:list.description_zh: 标签数组，元素为对象，如[{name: '推荐'}]

height.description: The height of the navigation bar, in rpx

duration.description: The time it takes for the slider to move once, in seconds
duration.description_zh: 滑块移动一次所需的时间，单位秒

active-color.description: slider and the color of the active tab text
active-color.description_zh: 滑块和激活tab文字的颜色

gutter.description: The sum of the left and right padding of a single tab tag, in rpx
gutter.description_zh: 单个tab标签的左右内边距之和，单位rpx

bg-color.description: Tabs background color for the navigation bar

name.description: The attribute name (tab name) in the list parameter read by the component is described above
name.description_zh: 组件内部读取的list参数中的属性名（tab名称），见上方说明

bold.description: Whether the font of the active option is bold
bold.description_zh: 激活选项的字体是否加粗

show-bar.description: Whether to display the slider at the bottom

bar-style.description: The style of the bottom slider, the form of the object
bar-style.description_zh: 底部滑块的样式，对象形式

active-item-style.description: The style of the currently active item, in the form of the object
active-item-style.description_zh: 当前活动Item的样式，对象形式

item-width.description: The width of the label, in rpx

count.description: The usage of the attribute name (badge logo) in the list parameter read inside the component is the same as that of name, as described above
count.description_zh: 组件内部读取的list参数中的属性名（badge徽标数），用法与name一致，见上方说明

offset.description: Set the position offset of the badge in the format [x, y], that is, set the values of top and right, in rpx.
offset.description_zh: 设置badge的位置偏移，格式为 [x, y]，也即设置的为top和right的值，单位rpx。

events.name: change
events.description: Triggered when a tag is clicked
events.params: index: 点击了第几个tab，索引从0开始
